Common Causes of Post-operative Cardiac Dysrhythmias Pre-operative risk factors Pre-existing hypertension Advanced age Drug rebound (e.g. cardio-active drugs not given pre-operatively) Post-operative triggering events Arterial hypoxaemia and /or hypercapnoea Pain Hypervolaemia Electrolyte disturbances (esp. potassium, magnesium) Emergence excitement / agitation Shivering Increased intracranial pressure Bowel distention Urinary retention
